content: I'm glad you found those tips helpful! I've been trying to cut back on shopping and focus on saving money, but it's hard to resist a good deal. Speaking of which, I also found a great deal on a handbag at a garage sale a month ago, it was only $10! And I got a pair of sunglasses for $5. Do you have any advice on how to organize my accessories, like handbags and sunglasses, and keep them from getting cluttered?
